datasource_modes.query: SELECT SEV.server_id AS ID, SEV.label AS ENTITLEMENT, SEV.server_group_type_id, SEV.permanent, SEV.is_base FROM rhnServerEntitlementView SEV WHERE SEV.server_id IN (%s) ORDER BY CASE SEV.is_base WHEN 'Y' THEN 1 WHEN 'N' THEN 2 END, SEV.label

mode.name: search_simple
mode.query: SELECT S.id ID, S.name SERVER_NAME, S.description MATCHING_FIELD, coalesce((SELECT 1 FROM rhnServerFeaturesView SFV WHERE SFV.server_id = S.id AND SFV.label = 'ftr_system_grouping'), 0) AS SELECTABLE FROM rhnServer S, rhnSet RS WHERE S.id = RS.element AND RS.label = :set_label AND RS.user_id = :user_id ORDER BY UPPER(COALESCE(S.name, '(none)')), S.id

mode.name: search_id
mode.elaborator: SELECT S.id, S.id AS MATCHING_FIELD FROM rhnServer S WHERE S.id IN (%s)

mode.name: search_cpu_mhz_lt
mode.elaborator: SELECT C.server_id ID, C.mhz MATCHING_FIELD FROM rhnCpu C WHERE C.server_id IN (%s)

mode.name: search_ram_lt
mode.elaborator: SELECT R.server_id ID, R.ram MATCHING_FIELD FROM rhnRAM R WHERE R.server_id IN (%s)

mode.name: search_cpu_mhz_gt
mode.elaborator: SELECT C.server_id ID, C.mhz MATCHING_FIELD FROM rhnCpu C WHERE C.server_id IN (%s)

mode.name: search_ram_gt
mode.elaborator: SELECT R.server_id ID, R.ram MATCHING_FIELD FROM rhnRAM R WHERE R.server_id IN (%s)

mode.name: search_checkin
mode.elaborator: SELECT SI.server_id ID, TRUNC(SYSDATE - SI.checkin) MATCHING_FIELD FROM rhnServerInfo SI WHERE SI.server_id IN (%s)

mode.name: search_registered
mode.elaborator: SELECT S.id ID, TRUNC(SYSDATE - S.created) MATCHING_FIELD FROM rhnServer S WHERE S.id IN (%s)
